item.title: Brutal Traffic – V6.1 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 18, 2025

Brutal Traffic – V6.1 1.55 ETS2

Changelog
Tweaks & improvements AI Speed and Behavior in Certain Weather Conditions
Better Anticipation of a Potential Crash
Other Tweaks And Improvements

Compatible With ETS 1.55.x
Compatible with all maps and all dlc’s
Realistic Traffic Jams
Enhanced Traffic Behaviour
Compatible with Any AI Traffic Packs
Lowered Amount of Trucks and Buses
Improved Traffic Flow
Road Traffic Accidents
Custom Road Events
Realistic Traffic Density Adjustments for Day and Night
Smarter Traffic at Intersections and Junctions
AI Vehicles React to Weather Conditions

Credits: Kass

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Wrecker DLC Addon v1.2 1.55 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 18, 2025

Wrecker DLC Addon v1.2 1.55 ATS

You can use it on one of our trucks from the list, or on ALL of them at once.
You don’t need to purchase DLC separately for each truck.
In the game, you just need to choose the appropriate cabin and install the Wrecker chassis.
Trucks for evacuation will be available in the “Freight Market”.

This mod works ONLY with the listed trucks:
Freightshaker Cascadia 125
Freightshaker Classic XL (including FLD120)
KW W900 Highway Killer
Pete 362 Cabover
Pete 389 Glider (including 379, 378, 388)
etc.

DLC Wrecker
Current version of the mod:
1.2 (Compatible with ATS 1.55)

Credits: Various

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Freightliner Coronado v15.08.25 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 18, 2025

Freightliner Coronado v15.08.25 ATS

1) Fixed dashboard lights for correct work
2) Fixed the right hood mirror camera
3) Fixed rear camera. Now works without pressing F2 mirrors
4) New powerful engines
5) More fuel tank capacity
6) “No damage” control service
7) Enhanced breaking system
8) Owned trailer, with skin
9) New loading screen

Credits: Stas556 & dmitry68, Brvs1nhv

item.title: Volvo NL12 EDC Gold v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 18, 2025

Volvo NL12 EDC Gold v1.0 ETS2

Pioneer of Electronics: The EDC in its name stands for Electronic Diesel Control. When it was launched in the mid-1990s, this system was a major innovation for trucks in the Brazilian market. Instead of a purely mechanical fuel injection system, the EDC used a computer to control engine functions like fuel delivery. This resulted in better fuel efficiency, more precise power delivery, and improved performance.

The “Gold” Edition: The Gold designation refers to a limited-edition series that was launched in the late 1990s. It was a premium version that came with all the available factory options at the time, including upgraded interior finishes and, of course, a distinctive gold-colored stripe or decal to set it apart. These trucks were highly sought after and are considered rare classics today.

Engine: The NL12 EDC was equipped with a 12.0-liter, 6-cylinder in-line engine with a turbocharger and intercooler. Power outputs varied, with common versions being 360 hp and 410 hp. The 410 hp version was, for a time, the most powerful truck on the Brazilian market, cementing its status as a high-performance machine.

Durability and Legacy: The NL12 is celebrated for its robust and reliable build. Even though it’s a model from the past, it’s not uncommon to still see well-maintained NL12 EDC trucks in operation today, especially in South America. Its simple, durable mechanical parts, combined with the groundbreaking electronic system, made it a truck that was both efficient and easy to service, which is a major reason for its enduring popularity.

Credits: LEO GAMER

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
